languages.text: "Впрочем, есть и иная причина оберегать таинство Знания от простолюдинов — оно бывает опасно. Исковерканная отступниками мудрость Омниссии зовется "{g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}еретех{/g}", и одно соприкосновение с ней может исказить разум непосвященного. Другая опасность — Знание, непостижимо истолкованное и преобразованное ксеноразумом. Этот бич зовется "ксенотех".

traits.locale_text: "Впрочем, есть и иная причина оберегать таинство Знания от простолюдинов — оно бывает опасно. Исковерканная отступниками мудрость Омниссии зовется "еретех", и одно соприкосновение с ней может исказить разум непосвященного. Другая опасность — Знание, непостижимо истолкованное и преобразованное ксено-разумом. Этот бич зовется "ксенотех".

languages.text: "Although there is another reason to deny laypeople the sacrament of Knowledge — it can be dangerous. Twisted by renegades, the Omnissiah's wisdom is called '{g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}heretech{/g},' and the exposure to it may corrupt the uninitiated. Another danger is Knowledge strangely interpreted and inscrutably twisted by the minds of the xenos. This bane is called 'xenotech.'"
languages.original_text: "Впрочем, есть и иная причина оберегать таинство Знания от простолюдинов — оно бывает опасно. Исковерканная отступниками мудрость Омниссии зовется "{g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}еретех{/g}", и одно соприкосновение с ней может исказить разум непосвященного. Другая опасность — Знание, непостижимо истолкованное и преобразованное ксеноразумом. Этот бич зовется "ксенотех".

traits.locale_text: "Although there is another reason to deny laymen the sacrament of Knowledge — it can be dangerous. Twisted by renegades, Omnissiah's wisdom is called 'heretech', and the exposure to it may corrupt the uninitiated. Another danger is Knowledge strangely interpreted and inscrutably twisted by xeno minds. This bane is called 'xenotech'."

"Although there is another reason to deny laymen the sacrament of Knowledge — it can be dangerous. Twisted by renegades, Omnissiah's wisdom is called 'heretech', and the exposure to it may corrupt the uninitiated. Another danger is Knowledge strangely interpreted and inscrutably twisted by xeno minds. This bane is called 'xenotech'."

"Although there is another reason to deny laypeople the sacrament of Knowledge — it can be dangerous. Twisted by renegades, the Omnissiah's wisdom is called 'heretech,' and the exposure to it may corrupt the uninitiated. Another danger is Knowledge strangely interpreted and inscrutably twisted by xeno minds. This bane is called 'xenotech.'"

"Although there is another reason to deny laypeople the sacrament of Knowledge — it can be dangerous. Twisted by renegades, the Omnissiah's wisdom is called 'heretech,' and the exposure to it may corrupt the uninitiated. Another danger is Knowledge strangely interpreted and inscrutably twisted by xeno minds. This bane is called 'xenotech.'"

"Although there is another reason to deny laypeople the sacrament of Knowledge — it can be dangerous. Twisted by renegades, the Omnissiah's wisdom is called '{g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}heretech{/g},' and the exposure to it may corrupt the uninitiated. Another danger is Knowledge strangely interpreted and inscrutably twisted by the minds of xenos. This bane is called 'xenotech.'"

languages.text: “不过，之所以不让门外汉接触神圣的知识，还有另一个原因——这么做可能会很危险。欧姆尼塞亚的智慧若是遭到了异端分子所扭曲，我们便会将其称为‘{g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}异端科技{/g}’，尚未成为进阶者的人可能会被这些知识腐化。还有另一种危险，欧姆尼塞亚还有可能被异形以古怪的方式阐释、扭曲，这样的危险我们称之为‘异形科技’。"
languages.original_text: "Although there is another reason to deny laypeople the sacrament of Knowledge — it can be dangerous. Twisted by renegades, the Omnissiah's wisdom is called '{g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}heretech{/g},' and the exposure to it may corrupt the uninitiated. Another danger is Knowledge strangely interpreted and inscrutably twisted by the minds of the xenos. This bane is called 'xenotech.'"

traits.locale_text: “不过，之所以不让门外汉接触神圣的知识，还有另一个原因——这么做可能会很危险。欧姆尼塞亚的智慧若是遭到了异端分子所扭曲，我们便会将其称为‘{g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}异端科技{/g}’，尚未成为进阶者的人可能会被这些知识腐化。还有另一种危险，欧姆尼塞亚还有可能被异形以古怪的方式阐释、扭曲，这样的危险我们称之为‘异形科技’。"

languages.text: «También hay otra razón para negar a los laicos el sacramento del conocimiento: puede ser peligroso. La sabiduría del Omnissiah, una vez deformada por los renegados, se denomina "{g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}tecnoherejía{/g}" y la exposición a ella puede corromper a los no iniciados. Otro peligro es el conocimiento interpretado de forma extraña y retorcido por los xenos. A este azote se lo conoce como "xenotecnología"».
languages.original_text: "Although there is another reason to deny laypeople the sacrament of Knowledge — it can be dangerous. Twisted by renegades, the Omnissiah's wisdom is called '{g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}heretech{/g},' and the exposure to it may corrupt the uninitiated. Another danger is Knowledge strangely interpreted and inscrutably twisted by the minds of xenos. This bane is called 'xenotech.'"

traits.locale_text: «También hay otra razón para negar a los laicos el sacramento del conocimiento: puede ser peligroso. La sabiduría del Omnissiah, una vez deformada por los renegados, se denomina "{g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}tecnoherejía{/g}" y la exposición a ella puede corromper a los no iniciados. Otro peligro es el conocimiento interpretado de forma extraña y retorcido por los xenos. A este azote se lo conoce como "xenotecnología"».

languages.text: 「一般人に知識の秘跡を与えない理由はもう一つある。反逆者たちによって捻じ曲げられた万機神の知恵は{g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}異端技術{/g}と呼ばれ、それに触れることで堕落する可能性がある。もう一つの危険は、異星人の心によって奇妙に解釈され、不可解にねじ曲げられた知識である。この災厄は異星技術と呼ばれるものだ」
languages.original_text: "Although there is another reason to deny laypeople the sacrament of Knowledge — it can be dangerous. Twisted by renegades, the Omnissiah's wisdom is called '{g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}heretech{/g},' and the exposure to it may corrupt the uninitiated. Another danger is Knowledge strangely interpreted and inscrutably twisted by the minds of the xenos. This bane is called 'xenotech.'"

traits.locale_text: 「一般人に知識の秘跡を与えない理由はもう一つある。反逆者たちによって捻じ曲げられた万機神の知恵は{g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}異端技術{/g}と呼ばれ、それに触れることで堕落する可能性がある。もう一つの危険は、異星人の心によって奇妙に解釈され、不可解にねじ曲げられた知識である。この災厄は異星技術と呼ばれるものだ」

languages.text: "Es gibt aber noch einen Grund, Laien das Sakrament des Wissens zu verweigern — es kann gefährlich sein. Wenn die Weisheit des Omnissiah von Abtrünnigen verzerrt wird, nennt man das '{g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}Häretech{/g}'. Werden Uneingeweihte ihr ausgesetzt, kann sie das korrumpieren. Zudem besteht die Gefahr, dass Wissen vom Xenos-Verstand fehlinterpretiert und auf unergründliche Weise verzerrt wird. Diesen Fluch nennt man 'Xenotech'."
languages.original_text: "Although there is another reason to deny laypeople the sacrament of Knowledge — it can be dangerous. Twisted by renegades, the Omnissiah's wisdom is called '{g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}heretech{/g},' and the exposure to it may corrupt the uninitiated. Another danger is Knowledge strangely interpreted and inscrutably twisted by the minds of the xenos. This bane is called 'xenotech.'"

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt aber noch einen Grund, Laien das Sakrament des Wissens zu verweigern — es kann gefährlich sein. Wenn die Weisheit des Omnissiah von Abtrünnigen verzerrt wird, nennt man das '{g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}Häretech{/g}'. Werden Uneingeweihte ihr ausgesetzt, kann sie das korrumpieren. Zudem besteht die Gefahr, dass Wissen vom Xenos-Verstand fehlinterpretiert und auf unergründliche Weise verzerrt wird. Diesen Fluch nennt man 'Xenotech'."

languages.text: « Mais si les profanes n'ont pas accès au sacrement de la Connaissance, c'est aussi pour une autre raison : il peut être dangereux. Déformée par les renégats, la sagesse de l'Omnimessie se transforme en "{g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}hérétech{/g}", et toute personne non initiée y étant exposée risque de s'en trouver corrompue. Il existe également une autre menace : celle des connaissances interprétées de façon inhabituelle et altérée par l'esprit des xénos ; on parle alors de "xénotechnologie". »
languages.original_text: "Although there is another reason to deny laypeople the sacrament of Knowledge — it can be dangerous. Twisted by renegades, the Omnissiah's wisdom is called '{g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}heretech{/g},' and the exposure to it may corrupt the uninitiated. Another danger is Knowledge strangely interpreted and inscrutably twisted by the minds of xenos. This bane is called 'xenotech.'"

traits.locale_text: « Mais si les profanes n'ont pas accès au sacrement de la Connaissance, c'est aussi pour une autre raison : il peut être dangereux. Déformée par les renégats, la sagesse de l'Omnimessie se transforme en "{g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}hérétech{/g}", et toute personne non initiée y étant exposée risque de s'en trouver corrompue. Il existe également une autre menace : celle des connaissances interprétées de façon inhabituelle et altérée par l'esprit des xénos ; on parle alors de "xénotech". »

languages.original_text: "Although there is another reason to deny laypeople the sacrament of Knowledge — it can be dangerous. Twisted by renegades, the Omnissiah's wisdom is called 'heretech,' and the exposure to it may corrupt the uninitiated. Another danger is Knowledge strangely interpreted and inscrutably twisted by the minds of xenos. This bane is called 'xenotech.'"

languages.text: "Gerçi ayaktakımının İrfanın kutsallığından mahrum edilmesinin başka bir sebebi daha var: Tehlikeli olması. Hermesih'in muhaliflerce çarpıtılmış bilgeliğine {g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}teküfür{/g} denir. Buna maruz kalmak, deneyimsiz kimseleri yozlaştırabilir. Bir diğer tehlike de zeno zihinlerince tuhaf bir biçimde yorumlanmış ve gizemli şekillerde çarpıklaştırılmış İrfandır. Bu zehre de 'zeno teknolojisi' denir."
languages.original_text: "Although there is another reason to deny laypeople the sacrament of Knowledge — it can be dangerous. Twisted by renegades, the Omnissiah's wisdom is called '{g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}heretech{/g},' and the exposure to it may corrupt the uninitiated. Another danger is Knowledge strangely interpreted and inscrutably twisted by the minds of the xenos. This bane is called 'xenotech.'"

traits.locale_text: "Gerçi ayaktakımının İrfanın kutsallığından mahrum edilmesinin başka bir sebebi daha var: Tehlikeli olması. Hermesih'in muhaliflerce çarpıtılmış bilgeliğine {g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}teküfür{/g} denir ve ona maruz kalmak, deneyimsiz kişileri yozlaştırabilir. Bir diğer tehlike de zenoların zihinlerince tuhaf bir biçimde yorumlanmış ve gizemli şekillerde çarpıklaştırılmış İrfandır. Bu zehre de 'zeno teknolojisi' denir."
